title: Textile, 1943-46-18, 18th century
medium: Silk and metal.  Plain compound satin, brocaded.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. Robert Woods Bliss, Dumbarton Oaks Collection
description: Large-scale design of scrolling acanthus-like leaves in gold and silver, and smaller-scale flowers in polychrome silks on a deep green satin ground fabric.  The pattern is so closely related arranged that only small areas of ground fabric are left uncovered.
